items.titolo: Attenzione a CrashFix: nuova variante di ClickFix
items.descrizione: Microsoft ha descritto l'attacco CrashFix che simula il crash del browser per convincere l'utente ad eseguire il comando che installa un malware. The post Attenzione a CrashFix: nuova variante di ClickFix appeared first

items.titolo: 3D printing with one of the world’s hardest Tungsten-based materials is now possible — material’s incredible hardness made it difficult to additively manufacture
items.descrizione: Scientists based at Hiroshima University have devised a novel way of 3D printing with one of hardest engineering materials used by industry.

items.titolo: Nvidia says it didn't use pirated books to train its AI models — company asking for Anna'a Archive suit to be dismissed
items.descrizione: Nvidia is pushing back against claims that it trained AI models on pirated books, telling a federal court that alleged contact with Anna’s Archive doesn’t amount to proof of copyright infringement.

items.titolo: Key to ultra-dense next-gen data storage could be a new magnetic state found in twisted 2D materials — German researchers reveal 'super‑moiré' magnetic milestone
items.descrizione: Researchers have identified unusual magnetism in twisted, two-dimensional chromium triiodide, revealing long-range spin textures that extend beyond the material’s underlying moiré pattern.

items.titolo: Retro Apple Mac mod implements thermal printer floppy swap — machine also benefits from a Mac Mini brain transplant
items.descrizione: A retro computer enthusiast has fitted a thermal printer into an ancient Apple Macintosh Plus.

items.titolo: NASA lancia Crew-12 l’11 febbraio, la ISS ha bisogno di rinforzi

items.titolo: Xiaomi 15T Pro in offerta: potenza da flagship ma con un prezzo da mid-range
items.descrizione: Lo Xiaomi 15T Pro raggiunge ora un ottimo prezzo diventando l'alternativa migliore ai top di gamma, con tanta qualità e una spesa nettamente inferiore a quella dei flagship.

items.titolo: The HP Omen 17 gaming laptop gets my recommendation - especially at this price
items.descrizione: The recent rise of RAM and GPU prices has made it hard to find good gaming laptop deals, but right now at Best Buy, you can save almost $1,100 on the HP Omen 17.

items.titolo: This 85-inch Sony Bravia TV dropped to less than $1,000 at Amazon - and I can vouch for it
items.descrizione: The Sony Bravia 3 may be a base model LED TV, but it still offers plenty of premium-grade features. Amazon is selling an 85-inch version for just under $1,000.

items.titolo: Are wind power generators actually viable at home? I tried one, and the results blew me away
items.descrizione: When solar falls short, portable wind power like the Shine Turbine keeps devices running. Here's my verdict after a year of testing.

items.titolo: I replaced Google Maps with a free alternative that doesn't track me (or kill my phone battery)
items.descrizione: Comaps features voice-guided directions and offline search, prioritizing privacy over the controversial practices Google Maps uses.

items.titolo: 20-gigawatt Chinese microwave weapon touted as ‘Starlink’s worst nightmare’ by country's media — portable 5-ton device can deliver full-minute destructive bursts
items.descrizione: Scientists in China have developed an incredibly powerful microwave weapon capable of disrupting or damaging low-Earth orbit satellites.
